projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_V01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Additional global changes for compatibility with DHARMA
Updating toward the encoding template v03

Initial import: harmonising file structure with DHARMA inscription template v02. Text and comments as inherited from the Siddham archive of January 2019, unless otherwise indicated (by a name and date in the comment). Comments are offered "as is" and do not represent a thoroughly considered or researched opinion.

div.p:
svasty. uccakalpāt mahārājaughadevas tasya puttras tat-pādānudhyāto mahādevyāṁ
kumāradevyām utpanno mahārāja-kumāradevas tasya puttras tat-pādānudhyāto mahā
devyāṁ jayasvāminyām utpanno mahārāja-jayasvāmī tasya puttras tat-pādānudhyāto ma
hādevyāṁ rāmadevyām utpanno mahārāja-vyāghras tasya puttras tat-pādānudhyāto mahā
devyām ajjhitadevyām utpanno mahārāja-jayanāthaḥ kuśalī kalabhikuṇḍake brā
hmaṇādīn kuṭumbinaḥ kārukāṁś ca samājñāpayati

viditam bo stu yathaivasma yathaitasmād
grāmād aṅśāḥ pañca Arkkadāmasya vorāleḥ pañca| Avalaptasya
catvāraḥ haridattasya ttrayaḥ dāmodarasya dvayaḥ viṣṇusvāmina dvayaṁ
kumāraśvāminaḥ Anśa-dvayaṁ prabhilasvāmine nśa-ttrayaṁ vodasvāmine ṅśa-dvayaṁ
vāsusvāmine ṅśa-dvayaṁ somasvāmine nśāś catvāraḥ rudraśarmmāya Aṅśaḥ
bhavanandasvāmine ṅśaḥ Agnisvāmine nśaḥ rudradattasvāmine nśaḥ sūryadattasvā
mine nśaḥ nāgadinnasvāmine ṅśaḥ paṇṇarasvāmane nśaḥ. Ebhir eva yathopari-li
khitaka-brāhmaṇair ata gr̥hītaka kṣattriya phālg
u
o
ḥ Aṅśokāś catvaraḥ siṅha
nāgasyānśaḥ Ādityavarmmaṇaḥ Anśa-dvayaM vaiśya śivadāsasya
tīhāradevasyānśāś catvara catvāraḥ
2anśa-dvayaM śūdra rāmaṇa-puttra-dāsasyānśāś catvāraḥ rudra
dāsasyānśa-dvayaM

Evam ekattra paṁcavinśatāṁ brāhmaṇādi-puro
gānāṁ yathopari-likhitakānāṁ sva-puṇyābhibr̥ddhaye puttra-prapauttra-tat-pu
ttrādy-anukkrameṇa candrārka-sama-kālikaḥ sodraṅgaḥ soparikaraḥ A-cāṭa
-bhaṭa-prāveśyaś cora-daṇḍa-varjjitaḥ Agrāhāratvenātisr̥ṣṭas

te yūyam e
ṣāṁ samucita- śūka śulka -bhāga-bhoga-kara-hiraṇyādi-pratyāyopanayaṁ kariṣyathā
jñā-śravaṇa-vidheyāś ca bhaviṣyatha. ye cāsmad-vaṅśotpadyamānaka-rājāna
s tair iyaṁ dattir nna vilopyā Anumodanīyā yathā-kālañ ca pratipāla
nīyā samucita-rājābhāvya-kara-pratyāyā na grāhyāḥ. yaś caināṁ dattiṁ lo
pay a e t sa pañcabhir mmahā-pātakair upapātakaiś ca saṁyuktaḥ syād. uktañ ca
mahābhārate bhagavatā veda-vyāsena vyāsena vyāsena

lg.l: d a ā nāc chreyo nupālanaṁ

div.p:
ti Iti . sāvvatsara-śate dvāśīty-uttare pauṣa-māsa-prathama-pakṣa
-ttritīyasyāṁ likhitaṁ bhogika-phālgudattāmātya-naptrā bhogika-varāhadi
nna-puttra-sāndhivigrahika-manoratheneti| ||

pūrvva-tāmrapaṭṭitaka-ṣoḍa
śa-halān varjjayitvā Eṣa tāmra-paṭṭa Iti| ||

pūrvvenāsyāghāṭaḥ
dehakapālyāṁ madhūkaḥ. Uttareṇa vaṅgramīṇa-nadī| paścimeṇa
yāvat parvvatasya gohārī-ghaṭṭaḥ. dakṣiṇenoṅgaragartta Iti|
